created_at: ZIM is now sitting on over $3 billion in cash. In 2021
column3: the company had total operating expenses of less than $4 billion (against over $10.7 billion in revenue). By this math
column4: the company could make no revenue for the entirety of 2022 and still have enough $ to cover the entirety of its operating expenses with cash (retained earnings) on hand.
